name: WKSnapshotConfiguration
desc: The configuration data to use when generating an image from a web view’s contents.

items.name: var rect: CGRect
items.desc: The portion of your web view to capture, specified as a rectangle in the view’s coordinate system.

items.name: var snapshotWidth: NSNumber?
items.desc: The width of the captured image, in points.

items.name: var afterScreenUpdates: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to take the snapshot after incorporating any pending screen updates.
